channel.title: thunar on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in thunar on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: foldermen
item.description: foldermen - Browse folders SYNOPSIS foldermen [-v|-h] DESCRIPTION foldermen Launches a rofi instance with a list of folders. Selected forlder will be lauched with gotofolder (and opened in thunar) OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. DEPENDENCIES fontawesome rofi gotofolder thunar

item.title: linktonext
item.description: linktonext - Move/copy/link files between two open thunar instances. SYNOPSIS linktonext [-v|-h] FILE(s) DESCRIPTION If two thunar instances are open in the i3fyra layout this command will move/copy/link selected file(s) between them. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. DEPENDENCIES thunar i3fyra i3list

item.title: gotofolder
item.description: gotofolder - Open folder and adjust layout in thunar SYNOPSIS gotofolder [-v|-h] FOLDER DESCRIPTION gotofolder opens FOLDER in thunar and adjust the layout depending on the path of the folder. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. DEPENDENCIES thunar i3get
